import '../styles/TraineeCard.css' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import AcademyCardList from './AcademyCardList' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; const TraineeCard = (props) => { const navigate = useNavigate() const {id, name, stream, academy} = props.trainee const api = "http://localhost:8088/api/v1/trainee/" const handleSubmit = (event) => { axios.get(api + '/' + params.trainee_id) .then(response => {setExamResults(response.data)}) .catch(error => console.log('unable to load data')) axios.post(api, { name: name, stream: stream, academy: academy, }) .then(navigate('/page4')) } return(

{name}

Stream: {stream.name}
Academy: {academy.name}
) } export default TraineeCard
